text: Volker Bertelmann (born 1966) is a German pianist and composer. He performs and records under the name Hauschka. In 2023, he won an Academy Award for Best Original Score for his work in All Quiet on the Western Front and a BAFTA Award. ==References== Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century German composers Category:German pianists Category:Academy Award winning composers Category:20th-century German composers
title: Hauschka
